docs.snippet: MEXICO CITY-Despite the predictability of the Mexican elections July 4 there is only one candidate tension and uncertainty are accompanying the transfer from an unusually strong President to a relatively unknown successor. The tensions apply not only...
docs.lead_paragraph: MEXICO CITY-Despite the predictability of the Mexican elections July 4 there is only one candidate tension and uncertainty are accompanying the transfer from an unusually strong President to a relatively unknown successor. The tensions apply not only to Mexico's chronic domestic social and economic troubles, but perhaps as much to its dealings with the rest of the Western Hemisphere and the underdeveloped nations of the world.
docs.abstract: Alan Riding article on pol, econ and internatl outlook for Mex after Jose Lopez Portillo assumes Presidency (M)

headline.main: Mexico Awaits New President, New Policies

docs.abstract: Argentina mil junta deprives former Pres Isabel Peron and 35 other Peronist figures of right to be elected to pol or union office and prohibits them from disposing of their assets or occupying public office; Fed Judge Nino Julio Garcia Moritan reopens investigation of charges of malfeasance and misuse of funds against Mrs Peron; assassination of police chief Gen Cesareo Cardozo recalled (M)

headline.main: Mrs. Peron and 35 Others Deprived of Civil Rights
